definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Micro - electroforming is characterized by both resist - patterned electroplating and resist - structural electrodepositing.
sentences.chinese: 微電鑄工藝兼具掩膜電鍍和厚膜結構電鑄的雙重特徵。

sentences.english: See the picture, this PT Cruiser has chrome front bumper and hubcaps.
sentences.chinese: 這輛車的前保險槓和輪蓋都是電鍍的。

sentences.english: The varnish was used for electroplated shelves of glasses with good performance.
sentences.chinese: 該清漆應用於電鍍件眼鏡架上時性能良好。

sentences.english: Electroplated copper shell can be used for many years.
Therefore, amorphous alloy plating has aroused people's attention.
sentences.chinese: 因此，電鍍非晶態合金已引起人們的極大關注。

sentences.english: The present invention can be widely used in the waste water treatment processes of various electroplating effluent.
sentences.chinese: 本發明可廣泛應用於各種電鍍廠的廢水處理過程中。

sentences.english: Is there an active continuous improvement team for plating voids in the electroless copper operation?
sentences.chinese: 化學沉銅是否對電鍍空洞有積極的持續改善小組？

sentences.english: Zinc alloy plating watchcase IP black strap.
sentences.chinese: 鋅合金錶殼錶帶電鍍IP黑色。

sentences.english: Fast barrel degreasing process has been widely adopted for pretreatment in electroplating industry.
sentences.chinese: 滾光除油工藝在電鍍業中應用廣泛。

sentences.english: All the mechanical parts been electroplated, he began to examine them one by one.
sentences.chinese: 所有的機械部件都電鍍好以後，他開始逐個檢查。

sentences.english: Between electroplated layer and substrate level of electroplated sample is obviously stratified.
sentences.chinese: 而電鍍層與基體層之間有明顯的分層現象。

sentences.english: A new kind of thermosetting epoxy modified acrylic varnish for metallic electroplated parts was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研製出一種金屬電鍍件熱固性環氧改型丙烯酸清漆。

sentences.english: Circuit board, semiconductor device mfg. method, and electroplating system.
sentences.chinese: 電路板，半導體裝置製造方法，及電鍍系統。

sentences.english: A lot of sulfonated bodies applied in electroplating field were particularized.
sentences.chinese: 列舉了在電鍍領域中實際應用到的各類磺化產物。

sentences.english: The effect of heat diffusion treatment on wear-resistant properties of the electroplated hard chromium coat were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了熱擴散處理工藝對電鍍硬鉻層耐磨性的影響。

sentences.english: The research emphasis on using ferrite method for treating chro-(mium) containing wastewater was also proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了鐵氧體法處理電鍍含鉻廢水今後研究的重點。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
